data.title: Theodora "Tee" M. Gardner Obituary 2021
data.meta_description: Theodora M.Gardner better known as (Tee) was born May13,1960 Chicago, IL. To her Mother Theodora Marie Pierson, and  Father William Gardner where she lived on the south side wit...
data.text:
Theodora M.Gardner better known as (Tee) was born May13,1960 Chicago, IL. To her Mother Theodora Marie Pierson, and Father William Gardner where she lived on the south side with her two older sisters Constance & Veronica Myart. Theodora attended Betsy Ross Elementary.

Theodora was married to Charles Coulliard soon after they had two children Daughter: Julia Gardner & son: Alvin Myart. Theodora (Tee) loved life & her family. Some of her interest and hobbies included: Camping, biking, climbing and her love of Martial Arts. Some of the skills included those of Karate, and Tai Kwando. (Tee)was very good with nunchucks. She loved watching weekend Kung Fu movies, and idolized Bruce Lee as the greatest Martial Arts Master of all time. Theodora (Tee) goal was to become a great Kung Fu Master and open up her on dojo and teach self defense classes or try to get into movies working as a stunt double yes she was that good and physically strong (Tee) was of afraid of nothing. If you were to ask her What was her favorite subject or what she like about school? She would tell you gym! because she could beat up most the boys even the one the bigger than her. When it came to family that's when (Tee) was the most happy, and everyone was happy for her because it was going to be a great day. All those who has proceeded in death before (Tee) as follows: (Mother) Theodora Marie Pierson (Father) William Gardner,(Husband) Charles E Couliard,(Sisters) Veronica & Constance Myart,(Cousins) Robert & Evelyn Pierson.

Theodora M.Gardner (Tee) leaves the memories to carry on : (Daughter) Julia Gardner,(Son) Alvin Myart,(Grandchildren) Shietta Jackson,Charles Graves Jr.

Marcus Brooks Jr., Aaliyah Brooks, Nathalie,Kautiare (GreatGrandchildren)

Noah,Bella,Kamari,Gabi (Nieces) Semina,Jevelyn Myart, (GrandNiece&Nephews) Donovan,Makeena Stenson & Caleb Gilmore, and many cousins on the Pierson family. Extended Family Members: Marcus Brooks Sr. John, Lena,Rita,Jaunitra &Keke Waters,Stacey Stenson and J.J Witherspoon.

And the God of all grace, who called you to his eternal glory in Christ, after you have suffered a little while, will himself restore you and make you strong, firm and steadfast.

1 Peter 5:10

Arrangements entrusted to Chicagoland Cremation Options of Schiller Park, Illinois.
